review:
I HIGHLY HIGHLY recommend going here for your dental worries. I have been scammed in the past by doctors, suggesting a 5k rupee RCT whose bill goes upwards of 25k. ****** ******* ** *** **** ******* * ****** * **** **** *** ** ****** First of all, he examines patiently and tries to go to the root of the problem , he then suggests what can be done to correct it. He will not suggest exorbitant surgeries or treatments, if they are not needed and he will make sure, you leave happy and cared for.

In a foreign city, where you don't have any idea about good doctors who might look out for you, Dr Sainath will have your back - financially , and health wise. He will always do what is needed and nothing more/less.

Doctor is too good. And his way of dealing patient was extraordinary. I must recommend others to visit this place without second thought in mind.He is so kind and generous, and most importantly he does not treat just for dollars but for well being.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: It was great experience. Doctor explained everything very clearly. He answered to all my concerns very patiently

Went to see Dr Sainath. He is thorough and suggested me a suitable solution for my problem. I am settled in USA and have visited a few dental experts there, but my experience with Dr Sainath was above par in comparison.

I suggest each and everyone to choose him as your dental consultant (his colleague and partner, Dr Prabhu Dev is equally good too, so I was informed).

Good luck, Doc!
Even though he did not have any clue regarding the main issue, but we did a dental cleaning, they still charged for consultation instead of only cleaning which was very steep.

I had visited clove dental earlier and it was suggested for root canal as per them, the decay was deep.

Then I visites Dr. Sainath, he inspected and find out the decay was not touching nerves and he was able to fix it with just a composite filling without any pain.
The doctor was on time and did a detailed checkup. The reason for gum inflammation was very well explained by the doctor.

review: DR Sainath was a real find for me. I have previously been going to a place which is flush with resource but over time you could figure out they are not really looking at your best interests. So I switched to Dr Sainath. Ticked all the right check boxes. I have started with nominal treatments but am going to do some required invasive procedures shortly. I have the confidence that he would always give me the right dental advice for the longer term and I would want that more people know about him
